titleStmt.title: A sectary dissected, or, The anatomie of an Independent flie, still buzzing about city and country. In a sudden, but not rash censure, of a scurrilous petition, intended to be obtruded upon the Parliament by our sectaries.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.W. for Ios. Kirton, and are to be sold at the signe of the white Horse in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the white Horse in Pauls Church-yard.
